channel.title: Project on Rudrrayan Manna
channel.description: Recent content in Project on Rudrrayan Manna

item.title: XPRIZE: Wildfire Supression with HARIS
item.description: My contribution to team FLARE-X, formerly team Texas-Soton, on XPRIZE for a drone swarm allocation and surveillance system - tasked to supress wildfires.

item.title: HackSussex 2025: BlueSentry
item.description: My time at HackSussex, and the project we made targetting misinformation from BlueSky in real time!

item.title: OrbitSim
item.description: My implementation of the Barnes-Hut treecode algorithm for N-body gravity simulations. Capable of hosting up to 100k bodies on low end devices.
